description: Job IntroductionWe are seeking a new team member in our US Analytics team! The US Analytics team is well established within our global community, and we are looking for a new team member to support our Marketing team. Through our work, we will build analytic capabilities within the marketing community and support fact based strategic decision making.Main ResponsibilityThis role will support our marketing team by helping them better understand data and to provide analytic support for monthly and annual routines. Additionally, this role will collaborate with global partners on all global analytics projects and support roll out and organizational acceptance of major initiatives like Project Sherlock, our internal data lake.Our Ideal CandidateTrust and respect are vital in this team. We work alongside one another, and we look after each other as we go. It is important that our new team members are self-starters with the ability to understand processes, learn new systems quickly and work efficiently and effectively. You will have 5+ year of experience and have direct experience in an analytics role at a consumer goods manufacturer or worked for an analytics agency working on syndicated data. The salary range for this role, based out of the NYC office, is$100,257 - $113,400.Other skills and qualifications include the following.Essential:5+ years of direct experience at an analytics agency or relevant experience within a consumer goods manufacturerEducation: Bachelor's degree requiredSkills: Must have deep experience syndicated data and its interpretationDirect experience in marketing analyticsProven track record of influencing an organization based on analytic insightIS Systems: Advanced knowledge of Microsoft Excel, PowerPoint and familiarity with Nielsen or Circana dataStrong communication, organizational and task management skillsStrong influencing & leadership capabilitiesEffective teamwork and interpersonal skillsOrientation to detail, with a specific focus on accuracyAbility to multi-task many items at once in a deadline driven environmentCreativity and innovative thinking in approach to processes, analytics and problem-solvingDesirable:Spirits: Working knowledge of adult beverage categories and retail and on-premise outletsExperience managing and manipulating large amounts of dataDirect experience in evaluation of new products and innovationWhat we can offer youWe offer a competitive salary and benefits which are designed to promote our employees financial wellbeing. Employees are also eligible to participate in a bonus plan.Our employees enjoy a generous vacation entitlement.Comprehensive Private Healthcare that includes Medical, Dental & VisionOur employees can join our 401(k) savings plan.
